Class CompletedJobSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompletedJobSet

  • public class CompletedJobSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of which jobs have been completed. We use a single integer to identify jobs, and implement this as a bitfield indexed by that integer. That is significantly faster than using some kind of a boolean array or a HashSet.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.math.BigInteger bits
      Internal storage for the bitfield.
      private int numBitsSet
      Keeps track of number of completed jobs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompletedJobSet()
      Initialises a new, empty, set of completed jobs.

      Computes whether or not a job with the given index has been completed.

      Marks a job as having been completed.

      Gets the number of completed jobs.
